fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Investigate (Night): Investigate a player to figure out who created their role.
-Deduce (Day): Guess a person who created roles. At the beginning of the night, all Unseen will know how many of their roles are alive, and how theyâ€™re distributed between factions. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Deduce cannot be affected by frames.
